comments.body: *** Bug 36348 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Looks like this has been fixed.

description:
In the page
http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-5.5-doc/jndi-datasource-examples-howto.html
the link to the "DBCP javadocs" is broken.
It could be replaced with
http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/dbcp/configuration.html (describe
configuration parameters)
or http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/dbcp/apidocs/index.html (the bare javadocs)
summary: broken link to DBCP configuration reference
